title: The Midterms Are Looking WEIRD ... but in a Good Way | Guests: Herschel Walker & Bill O’Reilly | 10/21/22
description:
Glenn and Stu review the Left’s made-up language and intent to destroy the country, but are also encouraged by weird poll numbers ahead of the midterms. Georgia Senate candidate Herschel Walker joins to discuss why he’s confident the attacks against him by Big Tech and the media won’t work. Bill O’Reilly explains why he believes the media’s midterm coverage is way off and gives his take on special counsel John Durham as his investigation wraps up. “Your Welcome” host Michael Malice reveals his favorite candidate of the year and the biggest campaign surprises so far. Where is ABC News journalist James Gordon Meek? Glenn and Stu review some of the most insane stories of the week.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
